Engine:
PresetType =
Type = CORE_NN ParentId = Connector =
LevelRatio = 1,1,1,0.5 LevelActivation = NN_ACTIVATION_TANH,NN_ACTIVATION_TANH,NN_ACTIVATION_TANH, NN_ACTIVATION_TANH, NN_ACTIVATION_TANH UseContext = true UseBias = true
MaxEpochs = 50 TargetMSE = 0.0001 NetSaveFrequency = 10 StopOnDivergence = true BP_Algo = BP_STD
LearningRate = 0.01 LearningMomentum = 0.4
type = CORE_NN parentId = Connector =
type = CORE_NN parentId = 0, 1 Connector = CORE_CONN_DENSE, CORE_CONN_LINEAR
type = CORE_SVM parentId = 0, 2 Connector = CORE_CONN_DENSE, CORE_CONN_LINEAR
type = CORE_SVM parentId = 0, 2, 3 Connector = CORE_CONN_DENSE, CORE_CONN_LINEAR
